title: A Flash in the Pan
description: Lilian Kendrick’s sometimes seductive, sometimes moving, sometimes wry, sometimes shocking ‘A Flash in the Pan’ is a series of tales about love-lives and love encounters, loss, deceit, death.Most will have you smiling with either pleasure or surprise. Some will make you thoughtful.Love is all around, and some of it is to be enjoyed right here.
author: Lilian Kendrick
